title: Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: The daughter of a Falun Dafa practitioner overcomes her own disabilities to stand up against the persecution and successfully rescues her mother from unlawful imprisonment. It’s a performance that is full of hope,” said one grateful audience member. The new jackets will be available in late January 2024. [](/html/articles/2023/12/28/213512.html) Since its founding, Shen Yun Dancer Inc has grown into a sizable company and is in urgent need of more practitioners with professional knowledge, experience, and skills. [](/html/articles/2023/12/28/213521.html) "Soon I walked faster, ate more, and was able to sleep at night. All my diseases were gone. I truly experienced the wonderfulness of being illness-free. Falun Dafa is great!" Master Li quietly watching the world from amidst the mountains after leaving New York following July 20th, 1999.
